items.sentence: Well, if you really want a drink, I'll make you one.
Tom says that he doesn't feel like drinking tonight.
Tom came out of his room, carrying a heavy suitcase.
Do you know those children who're swimming with Tom?
My parents were living in Australia when I was born.
Do you want to hear what that person said about you?
You don't have to be a genius to know who said that.
You're the first person I met when I came to Boston.
Tom and Mary repainted their house three months ago.
Why didn't you tell me that you knew how to do that?
